headline: Ask HN: Why is Chromium a memory hog? Why can't we fix it?
description:
Hoping someone with some architectural knowledge of Chromium can jump in here. I am mainly asking out of curiosity, as other browsers don't seem to suffer from memory bloat in the same order of magnitude.

So, what is it about Chromium that causes it to suck up so much memory? What is difficult about fixing this?

As a further niche, I'm also interested in this from Electron's PoV.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么Chromium是个内存大户？为什么我们不能修复它？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼Chromium是個內存大戶？為什麼我們不能修復它？
description_zh-Hans:
希望对Chromium有一些架构知识的人能够在这里插话。我主要是出于好奇才问的，因为其他浏览器似乎并没有受到相同数量级的内存膨胀的困扰。

那么，Chromium到底是什么原因导致它占用了这么多内存？

作为一个进一步的利基，我也想从Electron的角度来了解这个问题。
description_zh-Hant:

那麼，Chromium到底是什麼原因導致它佔用了這麼多內存？

作為一個進一步的利基，我也想從Electron的角度來了解這個問題。
